tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),Bleeding Gums Treatment,Teeth Whitening,
review:
I came here after being referred by a close family member . I was extremely happy and satisfied by the politeness and genuine concern of the respected doctor. The way sir carried out my treatment with full professionalism and patience, was an added advantage to my fear of being going to the dentist.
Very calm, caring and respectful behaviour. I am very happy with the results.
Thank you !!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good explanation the problems in teeth and remedy to solve it. The tr.eatment given was done satisfactorily
Overall good experience i visited for cleaning and my one teeth was minor crack so removal of sharp edges of teeth
reply_text: Thank you for the kind words.  We love to see our patients smile with confidence ..get you routine check up done every six months

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor was really friendly he was extremely gentle in doing the treatment. He was trying to keep me busy by talking about the problems I'm having and what he is going to do .

review: I am coming to the doctor for last 11 years. Very friendly, dedicated and helpful. Perfect in professional duties. I highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was very cordial. He explain everything in one go. I would recommend him and as I have to undergo further treatment I would tell about it later on.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback. We care for your health and look forward to treat you again , if the need arises. Stay safe and keep brushing regularly. Visit your dentist every six months.
